對於一個event S, 定義random variable I_S (indicator of S)如下:
I_S = 1 when S happens, I_S = 0 when S does not happen.
呢個r.v. 滿足E(I_S) = P(S), Var(S) = P(S) - P(S)^2
當A, B分別係資產A, B default的event
其實個correlation coeff of A and B就係I_A及I_B的corrletation coeff.
條式就係將Cov(I_A, I_B)分別用expectation定義拆開及用correlation定義拆開得出, 你可以試吓. 注意P(A and B) = E(I_A I_B).

對於一個event S, 定義random variable I_S (indicator of S)如下:
I_S = 1 when S happens, I_S = 0 when S does not happen.
呢個r.v. 滿足E(I_S) = P(S), Var(S) = P(S) - P(S)^2
當A, B分別係資產A, B default的event
其實個correlation coeff of A and B就係I_A及I_B的corrletation coeff.
條式就係將Cov(I_A, I_B)分別用expectation定義拆開及用correlation定義拆開得出, 你可以試吓. 注意P(A and B) = E(I_A I_B).

我完全明白鳥 即係將嗰兩個event 視為 indicator variable (Bernoulli distribution)

P(A and B)
= E(I_A I_B)
= Cov(I_A, I_B)+E(I_A)E(I_B)
=rho*sqrt(Var(I_A)*Var(I_B))+E(I_A)E(I_B)

再代入番 Var(I)=p(1-p), E(I)=p 攪掂
